page.title: 11Games and Leisure.
page.content: Every day at school we have two playtimes.The first playtime begins at a quarter to eleven and lasts for about one quarter of an hour.During playtime most of the boys in the Junior class play football.The girls usually play a game called 'Chain-Chase',sometimes they play 'Hit'.During second play the boys play football again and sometimes the girls play catch with a ball,or play hopscotch,or skip.When we get home from school some go on their 'B.M.X.' bikes.I usually play snooker or darts.In the evening I watch television,sometimes at about 1Op.m. there is a late movie film on, so I watch that and then go to bed.
